title: Design of Islam-Integrated Mathematics Education Combining Religious Studies and Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and general understanding of Islamic culture
context.additional_context: Learners face challenges applying mathematics in daily life and require integration of religious values with educational content. Combines self-directed learning via personal devices with offline discussion sessions

learning_goals: Students can explain mathematical problem-solving strategies based on Islamic ethical principles with over 80% accuracy.
Students can carry out project plans to solve community issues by analyzing statistical data with over 90% participation.
Students can present at least three cases applying mathematical concepts to real-life situations using a social science approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
